EmailTemplate.subject: Gartner Report: How to Manage New Trust Issues in Digital Banking
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> According to Gartner, financial institutions are using digital technologies to move beyond “customer relationships” to create “customer intimacy” and deepen trust. As consumers turn to your financial institution for advice and guidance—especially in today’s challenging times—their trust in you is more important than ever.
In this hyper-digital world, {{company.Company Name:default=your financial institution}} has a massive opportunity to provide 1:1 advice and personal attention to create a deeper level of intimacy everywhere your customers interact with you.
The tools are already at your fingertips, starting with the data you already have.
Read the Gartner report to learn how to combine your customer data with artificial intelligence to create intimacy and strengthen trust—while avoiding privacy and data quality pitfalls. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
